name: Autocomplete
description: The autocomplete is a normal text input enhanced by a panel of suggested options.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable component.
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to disable component.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.label: Placeholder
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify a placeholder.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify a placeholder.

properties.name: emptyOptionsLabel
properties.label: Empty Options Label
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to add a label that will be displayed when the dropdown menu is empty.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add a label that will be displayed when the dropdown menu is empty.

properties.name: variant
properties.label: Variant
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to choose one of three variants - outlined, standard or filled.
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to choose one of three variants - outlined, standard or filled.

properties.name: options
properties.label: Options
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to add options to a component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add options to a component.

eventHandlers.name: onButtonClearClick
eventHandlers.label: On Button Clear Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggered on button clear click.

eventHandlers.name: onChange
eventHandlers.label: On Change Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggered when the text in the input field changes.
